answerText: ligands[10] This theory, developed by Hans Bethe and John van Vleck, describes interactions of anions surrounding a central metal ion. It explains the colors of transition metal complexes.
heading: ACF Regionals |2013 | Illinois A + Dorman A + Wellesley | 14 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: These molecules can be classified by their hapticity. For 10 points each: [10] Identify these molecules which bind to central metal atoms to form coordination complexes.
